card.name: Create a Machine
card.description: Look at 3 random {{TRIBE:THRASHING_PART|3}} and choose one. Add it to your hand.

description.now: Look at 3 random {{TRIBE:THRASHING_PART|3}} and choose one. Add it to your hand.
description.prev: Choose a monster. Add a {{CARD:372|1}} to your hand with {{KW:TAUNT}} and set its base stats equal to the stats of the chosen monster.
